pageContext.description: L 85 mm; We 36; WLp 4.2; Ds 52.5; L separate piece 42mm; Wts.  101.4g & 15.3g,  Typology: very slight remnant of lower m-m.  ,  Condition: joining part of mouth totally detached and found 20 ft away; fair distortion at breaks; still some missing; cutting edge all corrosion chipped.,
pageContext.patina: Smooth green patina, many spots and patches flaked to dry Peel green surface
pageContext.other: Oddly, most of this card seems to be exactly the same as card number 21252.  I use a separate word document to dictate into and then copy back into this form so I could see that dimensions etc. were the same.
pageContext.collection: Hunt, Mr D.S. – private (1990) 40 Palace View, Shirley, Croydon
pageContext.remarks: Lower Left Corner: PIF box “Xerox in [arrow pointing down to] DF box”.  AFI checked.  Source: 8b.A. Ext: RSO 19/10/89. Rec. SN Jan 90.
